concept.title: What is a DITA map?
concept.shortdesc: This section gives an overvies of a DITA map.

conbody.p: A DITA map is a collection of topics assembled into a sequence and hierarchy. The hierarchy represnts a parent-child relationship.

A dita map file has an extension as .ditamap. DITA map describes the hierarchy and the order of its topics. A DITA map doesn't contain any content, instead it can contain a reference to the other topics.
